section.38: The Book of Manners and Etiquette

hadiths.text: Zainab, daughter of Umm Salama, reported:My name first was Barra. Allah's Messenger (ï·º) gave me the name of Zainab. Then there entered (into the house of Allah's Prophet as a wife) Zainab, daughter of Jahsh, and her name was also Barra, and he gave her the name of Zainab
